sentences.sentence: This would be the taste of lovage.
sentences.translation: 这样的味道会让人想起拉维纪草。

sentences.sentence: A sleep-promoting bath can be made from 6 drops chamomile oil, 2 drops lovage oil, and 2 drops lime flower oil, added to a warm to hot bath.[17]
sentences.translation: 促进睡眠的泡澡是由6滴甘菊油，2滴拉维纪草，和2滴酸橙花油，加入热水中。

sentences.sentence: ResultsSzechwan Lovage Rhizome and Liquorice Root had exceedingly significant effect on the content of ferulic acid in this decoction(P<0.01);
sentences.translation: 结果川芎和甘草对生化汤中阿魏酸的溶出量具极显著的影响作用（P<0.01）；
